title: CasinoCruise App Now Available at App Store
text:
CasinoCruise App Now Available at App Store October 20, 2015 10:35   
MSIDA, Malta-  CasinoCruise.com , an industry-leading online casino, recently launched a new mobile gaming app at the App Store. As one of the premier online casinos, CasinoCruise now offers mobile players access to a multi-vendor gaming platform with over 200 quality casino games. The software providers include Nyx, Vivo, Play ‘N Go, NetEnt and Microgaming. With the release of the IOS mobile gaming app, players can now power up their smartphones and tablets and enjoy innovative mobile casino games wherever they go. 
Among the many available gaming categories on offer are Slots, Scratch Cards, Roulette, Baccarat, Blackjack, Texas Hold’em poker, Stud Poker, Keno, and many more. The launch of the mobile gaming app brings all of this excitement to players everywhere. Thanks to this latest innovation, players can now enjoy the following: Access to 24/7 Customer Support Rapid and secure payments processing options 150 quality Slots games with Mega-Money Jackpots A dazzling range of bonuses and promotional offers One of the highest staff to player ratios in online gaming An opportunity to enter the Dream Cruise Vacation Draw 
Join us now, download and play at CasinoCruise casino App 
For more information on the launch of the mobile casino app, please contact CasinoCruise at support@casinocruise.com . 
About CasinoCruise 
CasinoCruise online casino offers players a multivendor gaming platform with over 1000 casino games. State-of-the-art technology, mobile gaming excellence and live dealer action brings Vegas-style realism to your screen in real time. 
CasinoCruise.com proud with their exceptional customer support, with all the trappings of luxury gaming from the get-go. With over a decade of experience in the industry, CasinoCruise.com comprises experts across the spectrum. CasinoCruise was recently honoured at the 2015 iGB Awards for Best Affiliate Program Newcomer. Packed with generous promotional offers, CasinoCruise never misses an opportunity to provide players with a wide selection of enticing bonuses and promos. 
Affiliate Cruise features as the official affiliate program for CasinoCruise.com. By working closely with affiliates, Affiliate Cruise guarantees prompt payments, reliable tracking, transparency and a diverse range of smart media resources. Plus the commission plans are second to none, alongside the partnership with marketing partners. Contacts
